Taxon.name: Source.Length.Diameter

mtc:Parameter.name: Position
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Where is it being measured? [plain text]

mtc:Parameter.name: Reference
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: DIN, ISO, ASTM, ASME, or Federal G-Series Measurement Specifications [plain text]

Taxon.mtc:Definition: Length Diameter is the edge-to-edge straight-line distance passing through the center of a circular object. It can measure the inside open space or outside diameter of the object.
